executeEvent() - Method in class aco.AntMoveEvent
Executes the ant move event by updating the ant's path, checking for cycles or completion of Hamiltonian path, adding pheromones, creating evaporation events, and scheduling the next move event.
executeEvent() - Method in class aco.EvaporationEvent
Executes the evaporation event by reducing the pheromone level on the edge, scheduling a new evaporation event, and updating the simulation.
executeEvent() - Method in class aco.SimulationReportEvent
Executes the simulation report event by printing the statistics and information about the simulation.
executeEvent() - Method in interface pec.IEvent
Executes the event.
